author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower diverter Valve waterproofing tips…I installed this valve for the handheld wand. The rubber gasket protects exposed backer board edges and diverts water away from the valve. The KERDI membrane waterproofs the gasket against the boards. For more shower waterproofing tips and step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial ❤️#showerremodel #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Shower Diverter Valve Waterproofing Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
